ygData.subject: Re: crushbone
ygData.msgSnippet: I believe that once you attack a guard you are attacked on site by any other guards in the zone, untill you zone out and back in. I killed some guards in
ygData.messageBody:
I believe that once you attack a guard you are attacked on site by any other
guards in the zone, untill you zone out and back in. I killed some guards in
qeynos, was walking around after and another guard that wasn't there
autoattacked me. Oh, do you need magic to hit the drybone skeles..
Arathorne, solsek ro
